summary: A singer who can't pay his bookie joins a nerdy, star-struck movie fan and his Great Dane in a cross-country convertible ride to Hollywood.
cast: Dean Martin|Jerry Lewis|Pat Crowley|Maxie Rosenbloom|Anita Ekberg|Richard Alexander|Valerie Allen|Leon Alton|Adelle August|Nick Borgani|Paul Bradley|Chet Brandenburg|Catherine Brousset|Drew Cahill|Kathryn Card|Paul Cristo|Jack Deery|Jack Del Rio|Beach Dickerson|Minta Durfee|Franklyn Farnum|Adolph Faylauer|Tom Ferrandini|Dominic Fidelibus|Raoul Freeman|Rudy Germane|Joe Gray|Robert Haines|Sam Harris|Gretchen Houser|Freda Jones|Lorna Jordon|Richard Karlan|Mike Lally|Carl M. title: Loco por Anita
